reference_summary:
Luther 3
Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Award Winners in Movies & TV, Emmy Central, Emmy Nominees
['Luther 3', 'Idris Elba (The Wire) won a Golden Globe for his depiction of John Luther in this gripping, smart, and riveting psychological thriller from the BBC. In this new mini-series, a twisted fetishist is targeting young women in London. As Luther is called to another case, will the killer escape his grips? Luther faces an even bigger threat as members of his own team will stop at nothing to bring him down. And as a vigilante killer takes justice into his own hands, Luther questions his own sense of morality. Can he continue to walk the thin line between right and wrong, or has he finally met his match?', ']]>']
{'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '27576722', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '4 hours', 'Release date': 'September 10, 2013', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'BBC Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
I loved seasons one and two and could not wait to watch season three. After having done so and recovered from the shock, I can honestly say I don't understand what the creators were thinking in having the characters make the choices they made. And the women, this season, were just two-dimensional victims for the most part. I'd probably re-watch seasons one and two but, sadly, not this one.
i liked the previous two seasons better

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** Strong interest in dramatic television series, particularly psychological thrillers, but also appreciates comedic narratives that diverge from standard formulas.
- **Favorite Themes:** Enjoys complex characters and moral dilemmas, with a noted preference for well-developed female roles and narratives that allow for personal growth and self-discovery.
- **Previous Engagement:** Highly rated past seasons indicate a strong preference for continuity in storytelling and character development. Recent engagement with a film suggests an openness to various genres as long as the content presents fresh takes.
- **Critical Engagement:** Offers constructive criticism; values character choices and depth over mere plot twists, yet is willing to recognize surprising elements within narratives.
- **Overall Sentiment:** Generally positive towards earlier work but skeptical of later installments when they do not meet prior quality standards. Recent viewing reflects appreciation for unique character arcs, even in lighter genres.
- **Viewing Habits:** Likely to re-watch shows that maintain consistent quality, though hesitant to revisit disappointing seasons. The user shows a willingness to explore different genres as long as the storytelling remains engaging and innovative. 

This profile highlights a viewer who values character depth and originality, showcasing a tendency to critique creative decisions while remaining open to diverse cinematic experiences.
